name: part_011
file: tmp_【#REBIRTH3D】Kureiji Ollie's 3D Birthday LIVE 2024 - REBIRTH, The True Me【hololive Indonesia】 [O607BZ8HwDk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Ollie introduces the Birthday Merchandise Set and the Postcard Bonus featuring illustration by Nanahami-sensei.
Introduction of the 'Rebirth Acrylic Diorama Stand'.
Introduction of the 'Voice Packs' available in Indonesian, English, and Japanese.
Reveal of the surprise bonus: a 'hololive OFFICIAL CARD GAME' PR card for full set purchases.

subtitles.original: 見ての通り、フルセット購入することに...
subtitles.english: As you can see, by purchasing the full set...

subtitles.original: ...さらにボーナスがついてくるよ！はーい！
subtitles.english: ...you'll get an additional bonus! Yay!

subtitles.original: Kalau kalian membeli full set-nya,
subtitles.english: If you buy the full set,

subtitles.original: nanti kalian akan mendapatkan postcard yang berisi tanda tangan dan tulisan tangan Ollie!
subtitles.english: you'll get a postcard with Ollie's signature and handwritten message!

subtitles.original: That's right! If you guys decide to get the full whole set,
subtitles.english: That's right! If you guys decide to get the full whole set,

subtitles.original: then you guys will get a bonus postcard with my signature and a handwritten message!
subtitles.english: then you guys will get a bonus postcard with my signature and a handwritten message!

subtitles.original: そうですよ！フルセットお買い上げの方には、
subtitles.english: That's right! For those who purchase the full set,

subtitles.original: オリーの手書きのメッセージとサインが入った特典ポストカードを差し上げます！
subtitles.english: I will give you a bonus postcard with Ollie's handwritten message and signature!

subtitles.original: Gambarnya sendiri dibuat oleh Nanahami-sensei!
subtitles.english: The illustration itself was made by Nanahami-sensei!

subtitles.original: For the drawing itself, it was illustrated by the one and only Nanahami-sensei!
subtitles.english: For the drawing itself, it was illustrated by the one and only Nanahami-sensei!

subtitles.original: この絵そのものは、えっと、生ハミ先生が描いてくれました！ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: This drawing itself was drawn by Nanahami-sensei! Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: Dan yang namanya postcard bertanda tangan, berarti ini siapa cepat dia dapat, dong!
subtitles.english: And since it's an autographed postcard, it means first come, first served!

subtitles.original: So, what are you waiting for? Go buy the set and get your hands on this baby ASAP!
subtitles.english: So, what are you waiting for? Go buy the set and get your hands on this baby ASAP!

subtitles.original: だからね、このポストカードをできるだけ早く手に入れてください！
subtitles.english: So, please get your hands on this postcard as soon as possible!

subtitles.original: Emang kalau beli full set cuma ini aja dapetnya, Ollie?
subtitles.english: "Is this all we get if we buy the full set, Ollie?"

subtitles.original: Ya tentu tidak! Ollie menyiapkan goods-goods menarik yang lainnya lho untuk birthday set Ollie.
subtitles.english: Of course not! Ollie has prepared other interesting goods for Ollie's birthday set.

subtitles.original: And of course, this is only the bonus and not the only thing that you'll be getting from the set.
subtitles.english: And of course, this is only the bonus and not the only thing that you'll be getting from the set.

subtitles.original: I still have other goods to offer you guys!
subtitles.english: I still have other goods to offer you guys!

subtitles.original: もちろん、これはただのボーナスだよ！
subtitles.english: Of course, this is just the bonus!

subtitles.original: まだまだ紹介したいアメイジングなグッズがあるよ！はーい！
subtitles.english: There are still more amazing goods I want to introduce! Yay!

subtitles.original: REBIRTH Acrylic Diorama Stand! Yay!
subtitles.english: REBIRTH Acrylic Diorama Stand! Yay!

subtitles.original: Wah, keren banget gak sih? Gambar yang dari postcard tadi jadi kayak timbul kayak gini!
subtitles.english: Wow, isn't it so cool? The drawing from the postcard looks like it's popping out like this!

subtitles.original: Isn't it just so cool? The illustration just pops right at you!
subtitles.english: Isn't it just so cool? The illustration just pops right at you!

subtitles.original: 本当に素敵ですね！ジオラマのエフェクトはめちゃくちゃ美しいです！
subtitles.english: It's truly wonderful! The diorama effect is incredibly beautiful!

subtitles.original: Dan gambar ini pokoknya cakep banget. Cuma menurut Ollie sih ya, lebih cakep lagi versi nyatanya, guys! Jadi tolong dibeli ya!
subtitles.english: And this drawing is just beautiful. But in Ollie's opinion, the real version is even better! So please buy it!

subtitles.original: It's a lot cooler in real life, so I suggest you guys to buy it and see for yourself!
subtitles.english: It's a lot cooler in real life, so I suggest you guys to buy it and see for yourself!

subtitles.original: えっと、リアルではもっとかっこいいので、ぜひ買って自分の目で確かめてほしいです！
subtitles.english: Um, it looks even cooler in real life, so I want you to buy it and see for yourself!

subtitles.original: では、次のグッズ！はーい！
subtitles.english: Now, the next item! Yay!

subtitles.original: REBIRTH Plushie Keychain!
subtitles.english: REBIRTH Plushie Keychain!

subtitles.original: Ah, gemoy banget! Pengen kubawa pulang!
subtitles.english: Ah, so cute! I want to take it home!

subtitles.original: It's so cute that I just want to keep it all to myself!
subtitles.english: It's so cute that I just want to keep it all to myself!

subtitles.original: 可愛すぎて、とろけちゃうよ！もう！
subtitles.english: It's so cute, I'm melting! Jeez!

subtitles.original: Dengan ini kalian bisa ngajak Ollie jalan-jalan pake kostum REBIRTH kapanpun!
subtitles.english: With this, you can take Ollie on a walk in the REBIRTH costume anytime!

subtitles.original: With this, you can take me out with the REBIRTH costume wherever and whenever you want!
subtitles.english: With this, you can take me out with the REBIRTH costume wherever and whenever you want!

subtitles.original: これさえあれば、いつでもどこでも好きな時にREBIRTHオリーを連れて歩くことができます！わーい！
subtitles.english: With this, you can take REBIRTH Ollie along anytime, anywhere you want! Yay!

subtitles.original: はーい！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: Terus kalian juga bisa matching sama REBIRTH Ollie dengan gelang REBIRTH Bracelet!
subtitles.english: And you can also match with REBIRTH Ollie with the REBIRTH Bracelet!

subtitles.original: You guys can also match yourselves with REBIRTH Ollie with the REBIRTH Bracelet!
subtitles.english: You guys can also match yourselves with REBIRTH Ollie with the REBIRTH Bracelet!

subtitles.original: REBIRTHオリーとREBIRTHブレスレットとお揃いにすることもできる！
subtitles.english: You can also match with REBIRTH Ollie and the REBIRTH Bracelet!

subtitles.original: Pokoknya totalitas banget deh! Very cute, very mindful, very demure!
subtitles.english: Basically, it's the total package! Very cute, very mindful, very demure!

subtitles.original: シックで、かっこいいで、美しいです！はーい！
subtitles.english: It's chic, cool, and beautiful! Yay!

subtitles.original: Tapi bukan itu saja teman-teman! Ada juga voice pack-nya!
subtitles.english: But that's not all, friends! There are also voice packs!

subtitles.original: Not only that, but we also have voice packs!
subtitles.english: Not only that, but we also have voice packs!

subtitles.original: それだけではない！ボイスパックもあるよ！
subtitles.english: Not only that! There are also voice packs!

subtitles.original: Ada yang Bahasa Indonesia...
subtitles.english: There is the Indonesian version...

subtitles.original: There's an English version...
subtitles.english: There's an English version...

subtitles.original: そして、日本語までもあるよ！ぜひぜひ聞いてくださいね！
subtitles.english: And there's even a Japanese version! Please listen to them!

subtitles.original: はーい！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: Tolong dibeli ya teman-teman!
subtitles.english: Please buy them, friends!

subtitles.original: Please, please, please buy them!
subtitles.english: Please, please, please buy them!

subtitles.original: グッズをお買い求めくださいね！
subtitles.english: Please purchase the goods!

subtitles.original: Dan kalau kalian beli set-set ini, kalian akan mendapatkan kejutan bonus satu lagi!
subtitles.english: And if you buy these sets, you will get another surprise bonus!

subtitles.original: And I mentioned the bonus card at the start but actually there will be another bonus that comes along with this birthday merch.
subtitles.english: And I mentioned the bonus card at the start but actually there will be another bonus that comes along with this birthday merch.

subtitles.original: そしてね、実はフルセット買ったらもう一つボーナスがあるよ！
subtitles.english: And actually, if you buy the full set, there's one more bonus!

subtitles.original: ジャジャーン！
subtitles.english: Ta-da!

subtitles.original: hololive OFFICIAL CARD GAMEのクレイジー・オリーカード！わーい！
subtitles.english: hololive OFFICIAL CARD GAME Kureiji Ollie card! Yay!

subtitles.original: Jadi Ollie REBIRTH juga akan muncul di hololive official card game lho!
subtitles.english: So REBIRTH Ollie will also appear in the hololive official card game!

subtitles.original: So REBIRTH Ollie will also be making an appearance in hololive official card game!
subtitles.english: So REBIRTH Ollie will also be making an appearance in hololive official card game!

subtitles.original: そう、REBIRTHオリーはhololive OFFICIAL CARD GAMEにも登場するよ！
subtitles.english: Yes, REBIRTH Ollie will also appear in the hololive OFFICIAL CARD GAME!

subtitles.original: Tiap pembelian satu merch set nanti akan disertai dengan satu lembar bonus card!
subtitles.english: Each purchase of one merch set will come with one bonus card!

subtitles.original: For every merch set purchased, it will also come with a bonus card that can be used in the hololive official card game!
subtitles.english: For every merch set purchased, it will also come with a bonus card that can be used in the hololive official card game!

subtitles.original: えっと、グッズセット特典として、hololive OFFICIAL CARD GAMEで使用できるカードが１枚同梱！
subtitles.english: Um, as a goods set bonus, one card that can be used in the hololive OFFICIAL CARD GAME is included!

subtitles.original: Ini hanya tersedia bagi yang membeli lewat hololive production official shop, dan kartunya hanya akan tersedia dalam Bahasa Jepang ya guys!
subtitles.english: This is only available for those who buy through the hololive production official shop, and the card will only be available in Japanese, guys!

subtitles.original: This is only available for those of you guys who purchase through the hololive production official shop, and the card will only be available in Japanese!
subtitles.english: This is only available for those of you guys who purchase through the hololive production official shop, and the card will only be available in Japanese!
